It looks like Pangea will be the terrain. I'll start looking for a 
suitable picture to work with, or else I'll make my own. In general, 
the terrain will be mostly desert with tree and marsh patches 
scattered around the terrain. RP the terrain as you see fit for the 
moment. =)

Kyle: Please hold the Monk's faction for a bit till we get things 
cleared up.

Jon: Can you send me a detailed description of where the Maximal 
base is, and what sorts of terrain encompass it? I'll create a 
corrisponding map for RPers reference. (I'll be doing the same for 
the Predacons.)

I guess we have a two day break on the 15th to the 17th, so enjoy 
it, or not (if you're itching to post =P).

ARG! I'm begining to des-- no, I do despise that Classmates banner 
that is usually at the top... "Is retard boy still a jerk?" Who 
cares...

=P

Please don't reply to this post over the message board.
(lets see how many people choose not to think about this one =P)
